initializationAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:triggers/stopsound');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s add Steven');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run opendialogue rematch_steven_end_first @s[scores={PokemonLeague=1}]');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run opendialogue rematch_steven_end_additional @s[scores={PokemonLeague=2..}]');
